com.orange.labs.sdk.session

Class AuthSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.orange.labs.sdk.session.AuthSession
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Session

    public class AuthSession
extends java.lang.Object
implements Session
    Class to authenticate Orange user via a web site thanks to OAuth protocol.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AuthSession

        public AuthSession(Context context,
                   java.lang.String appKey,
                   java.lang.String appSecret,
                   java.lang.String redirectURI)
        Create a new session to authenticate Android apps with the given app key pair. The session will not be linked because it has no access token or secret.
        Parameters:
        context - Activity context
        appKey -
        appSecret -
        redirectURI -

      • startAuthentication

        public void startAuthentication()
        Start authentication. If needed, launch AuthActivity allowing an user authentication else wait to check authentication with refresh token checkAuthentication(com.orange.labs.sdk.OrangeListener.Success, com.orange.labs.sdk.OrangeListener.Error)
